00045     virtual void onVFullScale2Changed(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);

00049     virtual void onForceTriggerTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &);
00050 
00051     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00052     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00053
